text.div:
This code system http://phr.kanta.fi/fiphr-cs-fitnesscategory defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
fitness FitnessFitness or physical activity observations measure the patient's fitness indicators: resting heart rate, maximum heart rate, active time exercised, sedentary behaviour, sleep episodes, calories burned, distance reached or steps taken. Measures can be timed over arbitrary periods (sessions) or over a day or week.

name: fiphr-cs-fitnesscategory
title: Code System Finnish PHR Fitness Category
description: Observation category code for Finnish PHR Fitness Category

concept.definition: Fitness or physical activity observations measure the patient's fitness indicators: resting heart rate, maximum heart rate, active time exercised, sedentary behaviour, sleep episodes, calories burned, distance reached or steps taken. Measures can be timed over arbitrary periods (sessions) or over a day or week.
